input.sentences: i was so happy the day i graduated .
dad and big sister were so proud .
there were a lot of kids in my graduating class .
i think i was the happiest one though .
output.sentences: My little sister is finally graduating.
My dad and I couldn't be prouder.
Watching her among the rest of the graduates makes me emotional.
Thinking about her journey from being adopted and rescued away from terrible conditions as a young child to getting to walk across the stage makes me happy that our patents had such big hearts.
Although my mom didn't make it to see this day, our dad's love and pride in her absence has grown twice as big for the both of them.
